common.tagline: Get ready to own your future. Unlock your true calling. Ace your interviews with AI precision. Be the one they remember.

loginPage.title: Welcome ðŸ‘‹
loginPage.loginError: There was an error with the credentials provided. Please try again.

resetPassword.title: Reset Your Password
resetPassword.description: Choose a new password to secure your account.
resetPassword.passwordChangedDescription: You're all set with your new password. You can now use your new password to log into your account and continue where you left off.

forgotPassword.title: Forgot Your Password?
forgotPassword.description: Enter your email and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
forgotPassword.checkInboxDescription: Open your inbox and click the link to reset your password.
forgotPassword.checkSpamFolder: (If you don't see it, check your spam or junk folder.)
forgotPassword.didntGetEmail: Didn't get the email? Click below to resend the link.

entityWelcome.institutionNamePlaceholder: Select or enter the name of your institution

signup.createAccountDescription: Your talent. Our science. Let's go.

interview.title: Interview Setup
interview.description: Manage, track, and ace your interview sessions with ease.
interview.sessionPreparing: Please wait while your session is being prepared.

levelStep.label: Level
levelStep.title: Which interview level would you like?
levelStep.description: The difficulty of the questions will vary based on the interview level you choose

questionsStep.label: Questions
questionsStep.title: What questions would you like to focus on?
questionsStep.description: Choose as many as you like

languageStep.label: Language
languageStep.title: Let's Set Your Interview Language!
languageStep.description: Choose the language you're most comfortable with for a smoother, more confident interview.

interviewerStep.label: Interviewer
interviewerStep.title: We've matched you with top interviewers, pick one and let's rock!

setup.selectLevel: Please select one of the interview levels
setup.freeTrialExpired: Your free trial has expired. Please upgrade your plan.
setup.subscriptionExpired: Your subscription has expired. Please renew your plan.

startModal.beforeWeDiveIn: Before we dive in, let's make sure you're all set for a smooth interview
startModal.beforeWeBegin: Before we begin, let's set you up for a smooth and productive session. Follow these quick tips to make the most of your consultation:
startModal.distractionFreeEnvironment: Ensure you're in a distraction-free environment with no background noise.
startModal.wellLitRoom: Make sure your room is well-lit so your face is clearly visible on camera.

audioCamModal.needAccess: To start your interview, we need access to your microphone and camera. Click Allow to continue.

careerCounselling.title: Career Pathfinder
careerCounselling.description: Track your consultations & uncover personalized insights.

myDetailsTab.personalInfoDescription: Update your photo and personal details.
myDetailsTab.phoneNumberHint: May be required for payment validation

profileTab.title: Profile
profileTab.description: Adjust your details, goals and preferences to tailor your experience
profileTab.statusDescription: Define where you are in your career journey to tailor your experience
profileTab.industryDescription: Pick the industry you want to focus on for personalized practice
profileTab.roleDescription: Specify your target role to make sessions relevant
profileTab.interviewChallengesDescription: Select areas to improve, like nerves, structure, or communication

passwordTab.title: Password
passwordTab.description: Please enter your current password to change your password.
passwordTab.newPasswordHint: Your new password must be more than 8 characters.
passwordTab.securityAlert: We'll alert you via {email} if there is any unusual activity on your account.

billingTab.title: Billing
billingTab.description: Manage your billing and payment details.
billingTab.subscriptionDescription: Manage your current plan details, or switch plans. Have questions? Contact
billingTab.popularPlanDescription: Our most popular plan for small teams.
billingTab.planCancelled: Your plan was {status} and will expire on {date}.
billingTab.upgradeWarning: Upgrading to a new plan will charge your plan immediately
billingTab.billingDetailsDescription: View your upcoming bill and manage your payment method
billingTab.changePaymentMethod: Change how you pay for your plan.
billingTab.billingDescription: Pick an account plan that fits your workflow

plansTab.choosePlanDescription: Pick the subscription that fits your needs

notificationsTab.title: Notification settings
notificationsTab.description: We may still send you important notifications about your account outside of your notification settings.
notificationsTab.notificationSettingsDescription: Select when you'll be notified when the following changes occur.
notificationsTab.summaryNotificationsDescription: Select when you'll be notified when the following summaries or report are ready.

tables.reportFailedMessage:
It looks like the camera wasn't turned on, or no questions were answered.
Please try the interview again.

shareExperience.title: Share your experience

interviewChallenge.title: Let's tackle your challenges
interviewChallenge.subtitle: Help us understand your interview challenges and what you want to improve.
